fields.Title: BACKYARD / SMOKER ON THE BALCONY
fields.Description: The balcony overlooks the scene of the hanging but he's not a witness. He told as much to the investigator before, who you can ascertain was from Whitewater: foreshadowing for the HONOUR COURT's arrival later. EDITED VERSION

fields.Title: You: ""Alright, we'll talk later." [Leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, we'll talk later." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Occasionally." He takes another dr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Occasionally." He takes another drag, filling his lungs with nicotine. "Why?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""It was my Sunday friend.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was my Sunday friend."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Time to bring out your secret charm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Time to bring out your secret charm: tears and begging! Show him your *emotional* side, throw yourself before his very feet like a dog!

fields.Title: You: ""I get it. Nothing wrong with looki..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I get it. Nothing wrong with looking good."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' with his cigarette. In the neighbouring windows you can see faint reflections of his silhouette, all from different angles.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I don't want to be seen talking to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't want to be seen talking to the *gendarmerie*, if that's okay. I just want to finish my cigarette."

fields.Title: You: ""Looks like you've got a good view..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Looks like you've got a good view of the Whirling's backyard. Can you tell me anything about the hanging?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, of course not. Could you pleas..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, of course not. Could you please lower your voice?" He scans the courtyard. It's silent like the bottom of a well, every sound captured and reflected back.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Good luck with the investigation."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good luck with the investigation." He walks away.

fields.Title: You: ""Can't you just like, toss that one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can't you just like, toss that one down?"

fields.Title: You: ""I need to get inside this apartmen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need to get inside this apartment building. Can you help me?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And when did you speak to this mor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And when did you speak to this more *muscular* gentleman?" The lieutenant takes out his little blue notebook and writes something down.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "That's definitely not his real name..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's definitely not his real name.

fields.Title: You: ""A shame. Young man like you, with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A shame. Young man like you, with a body like yours, you'd be a credit to any track team."

fields.Title: You: ""So we just give up?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So we just give up?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "You see a young man on a balcony nu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see a young man on a balcony nursing a cigarette. His eyes have been following you for a while.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "There's no way you'd catch that cig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no way you'd catch that cigarette anyway.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Ah, there it goes -- *wasted*! You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ah, there it goes -- *wasted*! You would have gotten at least a few good drags out of it.

fields.Title: You: ""Why are you whispering? It sounds..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why are you whispering? It sounds like you're *already* in trouble."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will remove the body as soon as..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We will remove the body as soon as possible. Now tell us, where were you last Sunday?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""My name? My name is Martin Martina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My name? My name is Martin Martinaise."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""You're right, it's horrible for th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, it's horrible for the skin. Very ageing." He takes another drag, before shaking off the ash.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""There won't *be* a next time." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There won't *be* a next time." He takes a last drag of his cigarette, before stubbing it out in the balcony snow. "I really need to get going."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Good luck with the investigation.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good luck with the investigation."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Listen, I really have to go." With..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, I really have to go." With a flick of his wrist he sends the extinguished cigarette sailing over the rail.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, for god's sake, I don't want y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, for god's sake, I don't want you to cry!" He takes a quick step back and looks around, clearly disturbed.

fields.Title: Logic: "Wait, is someone else investigating..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, is someone else investigating the lynching?

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "By god, this young man has the body..."
fields.Dialogue Text: By god, this young man has the body of a *decathlete*. His lithe form was practically made for vaulting over the high bar!

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "For a moment the man on the balcony..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For a moment the man on the balcony seems almost vulnerable. Something moves in the depths of his feline eyes: compassion, and a hint of understanding.
fields.Alternate1: For a moment the man on the balcony seems almost vulnerable. Something moves in the depths of his feline eyes: compassion, and a hint of understanding. There's snow gathering on his hair and on his shoulders, a speckle of white against the purple that hangs loose on his slender frame.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Last week? I don't know, look..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Last week? I don't know, look..." He looks around the courtyard again. Snow blankets the old patio chairs and dead house plants, and all the neighbouring windows are black.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "A *Sunday friend*? How intriguing....."
fields.Dialogue Text: A *Sunday friend*? How intriguing...

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' with his cigarette. Under the dull and darkening sky the neighbouring windows stand silent.

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, he probably didn't h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, he probably didn't have anything important to say anyway."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He could be a witness, him or his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He could be a witness, him or his *Sunday friend*. Either way we need to look into that *muscular type* who's asking about our case..."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Last week? I don't know, look..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Last week? I don't know, look..." He looks around the courtyard again. Old patio chairs and dead house plants litter the scene.

fields.Title: You: ""I'll come back to this later." [Le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll come back to this later." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, not you." He gestures idly. "S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, not you." He gestures idly. "Some more *muscular* type."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "It's the God of Cigarettes and Yout..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's the God of Cigarettes and Youth -- ask him if he's got anything to spare.

fields.Title: Authority: "Makes sense. Friends are nice on Su..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Makes sense. Friends are nice on Sunday. You don't have to work, you can just spend time with pals, watching rugby and drinking beer.

fields.Title: You: ""We should run after him, see where..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should run after him, see where he went!"

fields.Title: You: ""What's your friend's real name? Di..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's your friend's real name? Did he see something?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm working on it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm working on it."

fields.Title: Empathy: "But he hasn't left yet."
fields.Dialogue Text: But he hasn't left yet.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Trust me, I'm *not* a team player,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Trust me, I'm *not* a team player," he says with a honeyed smile.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No point in running. Tenements lik..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No point in running. Tenements like these often have multiple exits. If he doesn't want to talk to us, then he'll know how to hide himself."

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, that was obviously a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, that was obviously a bad idea. Forget I said anything."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Yes, really. Don't even try. You'll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, really. Don't even try. You'll just embarrass yourself.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""As you wish." He takes another dra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "As you wish." He takes another drag.

fields.Title: Drama: "He's an actor declaiming a soliloqu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's an actor declaiming a soliloquy. See how you hang on his every word?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Don't let him go! This could be you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let him go! This could be your witness -- the balcony has a great view of the whole thing.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""There's no trouble, I'm just speak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's no trouble, I'm just speaking in a *lowered voice*," he says sotto voce.

fields.Title: You: ""Listen, I really need your name.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen, I really need your name."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I couldn't tell you," he says, exh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I couldn't tell you," he says, exhaling a little puff of smoke. "We don't usually see much of the *gendarmerie* around here."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, we won't." He takes one last d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, we won't." He takes one last drag of his cigarette, before stubbing it out on the balcony.
fields.Alternate1: "No, we won't." He takes one last drag of his cigarette, before stubbing it out on the snowy balcony with a dying hiss.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "The God Himself has denied you abso..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The God Himself has denied you absolution.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, not you two." He gestures idly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, not you two." He gestures idly. "Some more *muscular* type."

fields.Title: You: ""No trouble from me, I just want to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No trouble from me, I just want to know what's going on here."

fields.Title: You: "What, really?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What, really?

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I am sorry, but I really don't hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I am sorry, but I really don't have the information you're looking for." His voice is soft and deliberate. With a flick of his wrist, he sends the cigarette butt sailing over the rail...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There has to be a way of getting i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There has to be a way of getting inside the building -- let's go check out the door near the pier again. Once we've found the way in, we can ask around for his apartment."

fields.Title: You: ""Can you tell me your name?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can you tell me your name?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What were you doing last Sunday?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What were you doing last Sunday?"

fields.Title: You: ""You still haven't answered my ques..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You still haven't answered my question. What were you doing last Sunday?"

fields.Title: You: ""Was it someone from the police?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Was it someone from the police?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There has to be a way of getting i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There has to be a way of getting inside the building. Once we've found the way in, we can ask around for his apartment."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He did leave us a sign, did you se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He did leave us a sign, did you see that? He wanted to draw our attention to that stone right over there." The lieutenant nods towards a small rock on a soggy patch of grass.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I'm not throwing anything.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not throwing anything."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' with his cigarette. Under the grey sky the neighbouring windows are streaked with rain.

fields.Title: You: ""Hold on... Can I at least have a c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hold on... Can I at least have a cigarette?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Thank you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thank you."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You didn't answer the question. Wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You didn't answer the question. What were you doing last Sunday?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He sighs. "I had a friend over.""
fields.Dialogue Text: He sighs. "I had a friend over."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""And I *really* need to finish this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And I *really* need to finish this cigarette," he replies with a subtle smile.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Is it really that important?" he a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is it really that important?" he asks you, adjusting his shirt.

fields.Title: You: ""Did you?" (Look at Kim.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you?" (Look at Kim.)

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "But hold on, what's that? For a spl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But hold on, what's that? For a split second his hand lingers... as though gesturing towards a stone placed right next to the front door...

fields.Title: Half Light: "Like a nervous cat, he keeps steali..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like a nervous cat, he keeps stealing looks at the neighbouring windows.

fields.Title: You: ""You're not actually called Martin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not actually called Martin Martinaise, are you?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, I just like to look good." A l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I just like to look good." A light breeze pulls back a flap of shirt.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh..." He waves lazily with his ci..."]
Half Light: "Someone hides behind a curtain: tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone hides behind a curtain: those windows have eyes and those eyes are watching, spying on you three.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I can *tell* that you finally got..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can *tell* that you finally got him down. Thank you -- it was quite a disturbing sight, even by Martinaise standards."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He's gone." The lieutenant puts aw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's gone." The lieutenant puts away his notebook and turns to you.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I'd even go so far as to say that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'd even go so far as to say that the view is a little *too good*, my dear gendarme. Do you have an estimate of when the body will be taken away?"

fields.Title: You: ""I need absolution!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need absolution!"

fields.Title: You: ""Shut up and throw, kid!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shut up and throw, kid!"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "It'll take more than rain to bring..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It'll take more than rain to bring this place back to life.

fields.Title: You: ""What do you want from me? Do you w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you want from me? Do you want me to *cry*?! Huh?"

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""*Trash*?" The young man shakes his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Trash*?" The young man shakes his head in confusion.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Help you? No, sorry, gendarme..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Help you? No, sorry, gendarme..." He shakes his charming head. "I have to run."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm pretty sure I didn't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm pretty sure I didn't."

fields.Title: Drama: "It's the voice of someone who has s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's the voice of someone who has something to *hide* my liege.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "A downy blanket of white to cover u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A downy blanket of white to cover up the miserable poverty of the scene.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Sorry, I don't have time for this...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry, I don't have time for this. I just want to finish my cigarette and be gone."

fields.Title: You: ""Hey, listen..." (Lower your voice...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hey, listen..." (Lower your voice.) "I am just trying to make things okay again. Can we meet again somewhere else?"

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, the police *really* need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, the police *really* needs to talk to you."
fields.Alternate1: "Actually, the gendarmerie *really* needs to talk to you."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh..." He waves lazily with his ci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh..." He waves lazily with his cigarette. "You already asked me that, didn't you?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "He's deflecting. He's young, with a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's deflecting. He's young, with a sharp memory. He hasn't had time to drown it in booze and chemicals.

fields.Title: You: ""No problem. We'll talk more next t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No problem. We'll talk more next time." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Endurance: "Not that he has to worry about gett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not that he has to worry about getting old yet -- he's sparkling with youth, a radiant demi-god.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He could be a witness, him or his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He could be a witness, him or his *Sunday friend*. It's worth looking into..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If we find a way inside the buildi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If we find a way inside the building, we can ask around for his apartment."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Absolution? I don't know that bran..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Absolution? I don't know that brand, but I'm pretty sure you can get Astras at the Frittte."

fields.Title: You: ""Please don't go! I'll stop drinkin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please don't go! I'll stop drinking, I'll... take the trash out, just... please don't leave me."

fields.Title: You: ""Son, do you train?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Son, do you train?"

fields.Title: Authority: "Ask him again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ask him again.

fields.Title: You: ""Are you on the track team?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you on the track team?"

fields.Title: You: ""You hiding something? Speak up, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You hiding something? Speak up, this is the police."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "It's a sign!"
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a sign!

fields.Title: Half Light: "Someone hides behind a curtain: tho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Someone hides behind a curtain: those windows have eyes and those eyes are watching, spying on you two.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Now, if you'll excuse me, I really..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, if you'll excuse me, I really need to get going."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Apologies, but this is my last one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Apologies, but this is my last one." He takes another drag and shivers.

fields.Title: You: ""When was that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "When was that?"

fields.Title: You: ""Nothing. You should give up smokin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. You should give up smoking, son. It's not good for your health."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Not looking for any trouble, offic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not looking for any trouble, officer..." he says in a quiet voice. Despite the cold, his shirt hangs unbuttoned on his frame.

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""What did you do last Sunday?""]
You: ""Too late, young man. Trouble's fou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Too late, young man. Trouble's found you."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Please don't go, I'll even stop smo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please don't go, I'll even stop smoking inside.

fields.Title: Composure: "There's something about the way he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something about the way he carries himself... Something enviable, mysterious, attractive...

fields.Title: You: ""What did you do last Sunday?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What did you do last Sunday?"

fields.Title: You: ""What kind of friend?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kind of friend?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Martin Martinaise? Good local name...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Martin Martinaise? Good local name. Let's go with that.

fields.Title: You: ""Great, let's do that." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great, let's do that." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Last week? I don't know, look..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Last week? I don't know, look..." He looks around the courtyard again. Rain patters on the window sills and dead house plants, too late to do them any good.

fields.Title: You: ""Did I?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I?"

fields.Title: You: "Let him go. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him go. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "Convince him to stay."
fields.Dialogue Text: Convince him to stay.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This isn't the place or time for qu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This isn't the place or time for questions: Who knows who might be watching from the distance, hidden behind the curtains.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He could be a witness. And either..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He could be a witness. And either way we need to look into that *muscular type* who's asking about our case..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""He could be a witness. We shouldn'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "He could be a witness. We shouldn't rule out the possibility..."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He gives you a honeyed smile, befor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He gives you a honeyed smile, before shaking off the cigarette ash.

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Alright, but make it quick. Once I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, but make it quick. Once I finish this cigarette I have to run."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I'm not sure that's a good idea.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure that's a good idea."

fields.Title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't reply, gesturing 'no' with his cigarette. Under the grey sky snow continues to pile on the neighbouring window sills.
